DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate visfatin level different stage periodontal diseases health , moreover effect non-surgical periodontal therapy visfatin level Gingival Crevicular Fluid ( GCF ) Serum .
DOC.brief_title: Visfatin Levels Before After Periodontal Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Total 45 patient divide three group base clinical radiographical examination . Group 1 chronic periodontitis ( n : 15 ) , group 2 plaque induce gingivitis ( n : 15 ) group 3 Periodontal health ( n : 15 ) . GCF serum sample collect treatment 1 , 3 , 6 month treatment assay use enzyme link immunosorbent assay kit .
DOC.criteria: Group 1 GI > 1 , PPD≥5mm , CAL≥5mm alveolar bone loss radiographically . Systematically healthy patient Group 2 No alveolar bone attachment loss Inflammation sign redness , edema increase BOP level , GI≥2 , PPD≤3mm , CAL≤3mm . Systematically healthy patient Group 3 No bone attachment loss , GI=0 , PPD≤3mm , CAL≤3mm Systematically healthy patient Exclusion Criteria group : Aggressive Periodontitis , Oral pathology , Patients systemic disease , Pregnant woman lactation period , Patients smoke habit take medication Patients receive periodontal therapy last 6 month
